SourceProxy.name: PyFRDataContourFilter
SourceProxy.label: ContourPyFRData
SourceProxy.Documentation: The ContourPyFRData filter computes isosurfaces using PyFR data. The filter uses vtk-m to generate the isosurface entirely on the GPU, eliminating the need for PyFR's field data to be transferred to the host.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Isosurface
DoubleVectorProperty.name: ContourValue
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the value at which to compute an isosurface.

IntVectorProperty.name: ContourField
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates which field will be used to generate the isosurface.
